items.summary: Update the LoginPrompt (hero/landing) component headline and description to reflect everyday device support: set the headline to 'Tech Support Expert | Fast Fixes for Laptops, Desktops, Mobiles & Printers | 10+ Years Experience' and replace any existing long description with the short copy: 'Jaipur-based pro fixing your laptops, desktops, mobiles, and printers remotely or on-site. Quick, affordable solutions for home/office. Message for same-day help!'

Add a Skills/Services section to the LoginPrompt landing page listing four bullet-point skills: 'Laptop/Desktop troubleshooting & upgrades', 'Mobile repair/setup (Android/iOS)', 'Printer connectivity & ink issues', 'Remote support via chat/video'.

Add a Pricing/Services section to the LoginPrompt landing page displaying three clear service tiers in INR: 'Basic Diagnostic: ₹500', 'Full Laptop/Mobile Fix: ₹1,500', 'Printer Setup: ₹800'. Each tier should emphasize a 24–48 hour turnaround promise.

Add a Testimonials section to the LoginPrompt landing page with at least three short client quotes: 'Fixed my printer in 30 mins!', 'Laptop running smooth again', and one additional quote about mobile repair. Display each as a styled testimonial card with attribution.

Add a visuals/icons strip to the LoginPrompt landing page with clean device icons for laptop, mobile phone, and printer, rendered inline to visually reinforce the service categories. Add a banner or hero tagline element reading 'Device Fixes Done Right' using the generated banner image (device-fixes-banner.dim_1200x400.png) and device icons (laptop-icon.dim_64x64.png, phone-icon.dim_64x64.png, printer-icon.dim_64x64.png) served from frontend/public/assets/generated.

Add a Portfolio/Work Samples section to the LoginPrompt landing page showcasing 2–3 device fix scenarios. Use the generated portfolio images (printer-setup-before-after.dim_600x400.png, mobile-repair-demo.dim_600x400.png, laptop-fix-demo.dim_600x400.png) served from frontend/public/assets/generated, with short captions describing each scenario (e.g., 'Before/After: Printer Setup', 'Mobile Screen Repair Demo', 'Laptop Upgrade Complete').
